actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage if the kender used the hoopak's sling to make a ranged attack.
actions.name: Hoopak

actions.description: The kender launches a barrage of insults at a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. If the target can hear the kender, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Taunt
